column5: Anyone fishing for crappie in  shallower lakes? What method and best times?
Welcome to the board. I don't fish crappie, so I can't help you out. But you should have went with a brief intro etc, and you might have better luck with your questions in the future.
Later in the afternoon, in the evening, night time, or a cloudy day. Good luck. Also please see the link below, http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=37139
